title: Home Internet Troubleshooting - No Connection
description: A customer reports their home internet service is completely down.

tasks.description: Run a remote line test and modem diagnostic.
Guide the customer to perform a power cycle on their modem and router.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear, step-by-step instructions for a power cycle.

tasks.description: After the power cycle, run the diagnostics again. If the line is now OK, close the case. If not, schedule a technician.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent re-runs diagnostics. The modem is still offline. Agent schedules a technician visit.
